products.title: Classic Carrot Delight Cake
products.description: Moist spiced carrot cake layered with smooth cream cheese frosting, topped with crushed walnuts and a hint of cinnamon.

products.title: Triple signature  Cupcake
products.description: A delightful trio of flavors — rich chocolate, creamy vanilla, and zesty strawberry — swirled together in a soft sponge and topped with a swirl of matching buttercream.

products.title: Tiramisu Velvet Cake
products.description: A sumptuous blend of espresso-soaked sponge and creamy mascarpone layers, finished with a cloud of cocoa-dusted frosting and a hint of gold shimmer — an elegant twist on the classic Italian indulgence.

products.title: strawberry shortcake
products.description: Delicate layers of airy vanilla sponge, luscious whipped cream, and hand-selected fresh strawberries, adorned with a glossy strawberry glaze for a refined, indulgent experience.

products.title: Strawberry Petite Cake
products.description: A delicate two-tiered sponge cake, layered with velvety whipped cream and crowned with hand-selected, jewel-like strawberries. Each slice offers a harmonious balance of light, airy cake and fresh, luscious fruit—a refined indulgence for the senses.

products.title: Symphony Layer Cake
products.description: Layers of light sponge and silky whipped cream, crowned with fresh, jewel-like strawberries. An elegant indulgence that delights both the eyes and the palate.

products.title: Lemon Cheese Cake
products.description: Bright, zesty lemon sponge layered with smooth, tangy cream, finished with a delicate glaze and lemon zest. A refreshing, elegant treat that awakens the senses.

products.title: signature Matcha Cheesecake
products.description: Velvety cheesecake infused with premium matcha, resting on a crisp buttery base and finished with a delicate dusting of green tea powder. A refined balance of earthy bitterness and creamy sweetness in every bite.

products.title: Caramel Tart Cake
products.description: Layers of tender sponge and silky caramel cream, crowned with a glossy caramel glaze. A sophisticated harmony of sweet, buttery richness and delicate tart notes in every bite.

products.title: Velvet Cake
products.description: Sumptuously soft red velvet layers paired with smooth, creamy frosting. A timeless indulgence that combines elegance, richness, and a touch of romance in every bite.RR

products.title: Chocolatet fudge Cake
products.description: Rich, moist chocolate layers enveloped in silky chocolate ganache. A luxurious treat for true chocolate lovers, where every bite melts into pure bliss.

products.title: Festive Fruit Cake
products.description: A moist, spiced cake layered with an abundance of glazed fruits and nuts. Elegantly rich and flavorful, celebrating the natural sweetness of hand-selected fruits in every bite.
